sqlMap.statement: WITH PAW AS ( SELECT RWS_NUM ,GLBL_CMPY_CD ,RWS_REF_NUM ,WH_CD FROM RWS_PUT_AWAY_WRK WHERE WRK_TRX_ID = #wrkTrxId# AND SQ_ID = #sqId# AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) SELECT PAW.RWS_NUM AS RWS_NUM_01 ,RH.RWS_NUM AS RWS_NUM_02 FROM PAW ,RWS_HDR RH WHERE PAW.RWS_NUM != RH.RWS_NUM AND PAW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PAW.RWS_REF_NUM = RH.RWS_REF_NUM AND PAW.WH_CD = RH.WH_CD AND RH.RWS_STS_CD = #rwsStsPrnt# AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT R_DTL.RWS_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.INVTY_STK_STS_CD ,R_DTL.RWS_QTY ,R_DTL.RWS_PUT_AWAY_QTY ,R_DTL.MDSE_CD ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_STS_CD AS DTL_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_STS_CD AS HDR_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_REF_NUM ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM ,R_HDR.SYS_SRC_CD ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,R_HDR.FROM_LOC_CD ,ILV.INVTY_LOC_NM AS LOC_NM ,P_HDR.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM AS PO_ORD_NUM ,P_HDR.CUST_PO_NUM ,P_DTL.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM AS PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM ,P_HDR.DOM_INV_NUM ,PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM FROM RWS_DTL R_DTL ,RWS_HDR R_HDR ,DS_INVTY_LOC_V ILV ,PO_RCV_HDR P_HDR ,PO_RCV_DTL P_DTL ,PRCH_REQ PR WHERE R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND R_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = R_HDR.RWS_NUM AND R_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ILV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.INVTY_LOC_CD = ILV.INVTY_LOC_CD AND ILV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM = P_HDR.PO_RCV_NUM AND P_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND P_HDR.PO_RCV_NUM = P_DTL.PO_RCV_NUM AND R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM = P_DTL.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM AND P_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_NUM = PR.PRCH_REQ_NUM(+) AND PR.PRCH_REQ_REC_TP_CD(+) = #prchReqRecTpCd# AND PR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'

SELECT R_DTL.RWS_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.INVTY_STK_STS_CD ,R_DTL.RWS_QTY ,R_DTL.RWS_PUT_AWAY_QTY ,R_DTL.MDSE_CD ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_STS_CD AS DTL_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_STS_CD AS HDR_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_REF_NUM ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM ,R_HDR.SYS_SRC_CD ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,R_HDR.FROM_LOC_CD ,ILV.INVTY_LOC_NM AS LOC_NM ,P_HDR.CUST_PO_NUM ,S_DTL.SO_NUM ,S_DTL.TRX_HDR_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,S_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM AS CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,S_DTL.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM AS CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,R_HDR.TRX_CD ,R_HDR.TRX_RSN_CD ,R_DTL.SHIP_FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_NUM ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM ,FRW.INVTY_ACCT_CD AS FROM_INVTY_ACCT_CD ,FRW.RTL_WH_CATG_CD AS FROM_RTL_WH_CATG_CD ,FIO.CMPY_INVTY_FLG AS FROM_CMPY_INVTY_FLG ,TRW.INVTY_ACCT_CD AS TO_INVTY_ACCT_CD ,TRW.RTL_WH_CATG_CD AS TO_RTL_WH_CATG_CD ,TIO.CMPY_INVTY_FLG AS TO_CMPY_INVTY_FLG FROM RWS_DTL R_DTL ,RWS_HDR R_HDR ,DS_INVTY_LOC_V ILV ,PO_RCV_HDR P_HDR ,PO_RCV_DTL P_DTL ,SHPG_ORD_DTL S_DTL ,RTL_WH FRW ,RTL_WH TRW ,INVTY_OWNR FIO ,INVTY_OWNR TIO WHERE R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND R_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = R_HDR.RWS_NUM AND R_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ILV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.INVTY_LOC_CD = ILV.INVTY_LOC_CD AND ILV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM = P_HDR.PO_RCV_NUM AND P_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND P_HDR.PO_RCV_NUM = P_DTL.PO_RCV_NUM AND R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM = P_DTL.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM AND P_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = S_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND P_HDR.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM = S_DTL.SO_NUM AND P_DTL.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM = S_DTL.SO_SLP_NUM AND S_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FRW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.FROM_LOC_CD = FRW.RTL_WH_CD AND FRW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND FRW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FIO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND FRW.INVTY_OWNR_CD = FIO.INVTY_OWNR_CD AND FIO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.WH_CD = TRW.RTL_WH_CD AND TRW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TRW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TIO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRW.INVTY_OWNR_CD = TIO.INVTY_OWNR_CD AND TIO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT R_DTL.RWS_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.INVTY_STK_STS_CD ,R_DTL.RWS_QTY ,R_DTL.RWS_PUT_AWAY_QTY ,R_DTL.MDSE_CD ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_STS_CD AS DTL_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_STS_CD AS HDR_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_REF_NUM ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM ,R_HDR.SYS_SRC_CD ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,R_HDR.FROM_LOC_CD ,ILV.INVTY_LOC_NM AS LOC_NM ,P_HDR.CUST_PO_NUM ,S_DTL.SO_NUM ,S_DTL.TRX_HDR_NUM AS INVTY_ORD_NUM ,S_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM AS INVTY_ORD_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.SHIP_FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_NUM ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM FROM RWS_DTL R_DTL ,RWS_HDR R_HDR ,DS_INVTY_LOC_V ILV ,PO_RCV_HDR P_HDR ,PO_RCV_DTL P_DTL ,SHPG_ORD_DTL S_DTL WHERE R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND R_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = R_HDR.RWS_NUM AND R_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ILV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.INVTY_LOC_CD = ILV.INVTY_LOC_CD AND ILV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM = P_HDR.PO_RCV_NUM AND P_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND P_HDR.PO_RCV_NUM = P_DTL.PO_RCV_NUM AND R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM = P_DTL.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM AND P_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = S_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND P_HDR.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM = S_DTL.SO_NUM AND P_DTL.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM = S_DTL.SO_SLP_NUM AND S_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT R_DTL.RWS_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.INVTY_STK_STS_CD ,R_DTL.RWS_QTY ,R_DTL.RWS_PUT_AWAY_QTY ,R_DTL.MDSE_CD ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_STS_CD AS DTL_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_STS_CD AS HDR_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_REF_NUM ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM ,R_HDR.SYS_SRC_CD ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,R_HDR.FROM_LOC_CD ,ILV.INVTY_LOC_NM AS LOC_NM ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM AS DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM AS DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM ,R_DTL.TRX_CD ,R_DTL.TRX_RSN_CD ,C_DTL.ORIG_CPO_ORD_NUM ,C_DTL.REF_CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,C_DTL.REF_CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,C_DTL.ORD_SRC_REF_LINE_NUM ,C_DTL.ORD_SRC_REF_LINE_SUB_NUM ,C_HDR.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,C_CONF.BILL_TO_CUST_LOC_CD ,C_DTL.ORIG_CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,C_DTL.ORIG_CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM FROM RWS_DTL R_DTL ,RWS_HDR R_HDR ,DS_INVTY_LOC_V ILV ,DS_CPO_RTRN_DTL C_DTL ,CPO C_HDR ,DS_CPO_CONFIG C_CONF WHERE R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND R_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = R_HDR.RWS_NUM AND R_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ILV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.INVTY_LOC_CD = ILV.INVTY_LOC_CD AND ILV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM = C_DTL.CPO_ORD_NUM AND R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM = C_DTL.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM AND R_DTL.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = C_DTL.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM AND C_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C_DTL.CPO_ORD_NUM = C_HDR.CPO_ORD_NUM AND C_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C_CONF.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C_DTL.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = C_CONF.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AND C_CONF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT R_DTL.RWS_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.INVTY_STK_STS_CD ,R_DTL.RWS_QTY ,R_DTL.RWS_PUT_AWAY_QTY ,R_DTL.MDSE_CD ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_STS_CD AS DTL_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_STS_CD AS HDR_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_REF_NUM ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM ,R_HDR.SYS_SRC_CD ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,R_HDR.FROM_LOC_CD ,ILV.INVTY_LOC_NM AS LOC_NM ,P_HDR.CUST_PO_NUM ,R_HDR.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM ,R_DTL.SHIP_FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD FROM RWS_DTL R_DTL ,RWS_HDR R_HDR ,DS_INVTY_LOC_V ILV ,PO_RCV_HDR P_HDR WHERE R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND R_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = R_HDR.RWS_NUM AND R_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ILV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.INVTY_LOC_CD = ILV.INVTY_LOC_CD AND ILV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = P_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM = P_HDR.PO_RCV_NUM AND P_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,IV.INBD_VIS_PK ,IV.INBD_LTST_REC_FLG ,IV.INBD_VIS_EVENT_CD ,IV.INBD_VIS_DATA_TP_CD ,IV.INBD_VIS_ACTL_FLG ,IV.IMPT_INV_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,IV.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,IV.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,IV.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,IV.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,IV.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,IV.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,IV.MDSE_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_PO_TP_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_PO_NUM ,IV.PO_RCV_NUM ,IV.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM ,IV.RWS_REF_NUM ,IV.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,IV.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,IV.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,IV.LGSC_SCP_RQST_NUM ,IV.LGSC_SCP_RQST_LINE_NUM ,IV.LGSC_SCP_ORD_NUM ,IV.LGSC_SCP_ORD_LINE_NUM ,IV.LGSC_DELY_TP_CD ,IV.SCP_CNTNR_NUM ,IV.TRUCK_CNTNR_PK ,IV.VIS_LOC_TP_CD ,IV.VIS_LOC_CD ,IV.VIS_LOC_NM ,IV.VIS_QTY ,IV.ETA_ETD_DT ,IV.CALC_FLG ,IV.CRAT_TS ,IV.REGD_TS ,IV.INLND_SHPG_METH_CD ,IV.INLND_CARR_CD ,IV.RWS_NUM ,IV.INVTY_STK_STS_CD ,IV.IMPT_INV_CNSGN_CD ,IV.IMPT_CUST_PO_NUM FROM INBD_VIS IV WHERE IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IV.PO_RCV_NUM = #poRcvNum# AND IV.PO_RCV_LINE_NUM = #poRcvLineNum# AND IV.INBD_LTST_REC_FLG = #inbdLtstRecFlg# AND IV.INBD_VIS_ACTL_FLG = #inbdVisActlFlg# AND IV.VIS_LOC_TP_CD = #visLocTpCd# AND IV.VIS_LOC_CD = #visLocCd# AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT SP.SHPG_PLN_NUM FROM SHPG_PLN SP ,SHPG_STS SS WHERE SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SP.TRX_HDR_NUM = #cpoOrdNum# AND SP.TRX_LINE_NUM = #cpoDtlLineNum# AND SP.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = #cpoDtlLineSubNum# AND SP.SHIP_PLN_CANC_FLG = #shipPlnCancFlgN# AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SP.SHPG_STS_CD = SS.SHPG_STS_CD AND SS.SHIP_FLG = #shipFlgN# AND SS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' UNION SELECT RH.RWS_NUM FROM SHPG_ORD_DTL SOD ,RWS_HDR RH ,RWS_DTL RD ,RWS_STS RS WHERE SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SOD.TRX_HDR_NUM = #cpoOrdNum# AND SOD.TRX_LINE_NUM = #cpoDtlLineNum# AND SOD.TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = #cpoDtlLineSubNum# AND SOD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SOD.SO_NUM = RH.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SOD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RH.RWS_NUM = RD.RWS_NUM AND SOD.SO_SLP_NUM = RD.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM AND RD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RD.RWS_STS_CD = RS.RWS_STS_CD AND RS.RWS_OPEN_FLG = #rwsOpenFlgY# AND RS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )

SELECT COUNT(CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM) FROM CPO_DTL WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CPO_ORD_NUM = #cpoOrdNum# AND ORD_LINE_STS_CD NOT IN (#ordLineStsCdClosed#, #ordLineStsCdCancelled#) AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RPASW.SER_NUM FROM RWS_PUT_AWAY_SER_WRK RPASW WHERE RPASW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RPASW.WRK_TRX_ID = #wrkTrxId# AND RPASW.SQ_ID = #sqId# AND RPASW.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND RPASW.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND RPASW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT DCRD.CPO_ORD_NUM , DCRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM , DCRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM FROM DS_CPO_RTRN_DTL DCRD WHERE DCRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DCRD.CPO_ORD_NUM = #trxOrdNum# AND DCRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_NUM = #trxLineNum# AND DCRD.DS_CPO_RTRN_LINE_SUB_NUM = #trxLineSubNum# AND DCRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT R_HDR.RWS_NUM ,R_HDR.WH_CD ,R_HDR.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_REF_NUM ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM ,R_HDR.SYS_SRC_CD ,R_HDR.FROM_LOC_CD ,R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_QTY ,R_DTL.RWS_PUT_AWAY_QTY ,R_DTL.MDSE_CD ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_STS_CD ,R_DTL.INVTY_LOC_CD ,R_DTL.SHIP_FROM_INVTY_LOC_CD ,R_HDR.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM AS PO_ORD_NUM ,R_DTL.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM AS PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_STS_CD AS DTL_RWS_STS_CD ,R_HDR.RWS_STS_CD AS HDR_RWS_STS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_STS_PK ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_VER_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_SLP_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_DO_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_DO_CLS_CD ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_LINE_NUM ,R_DTL.IMPT_PACK_SLP_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_LOT_NUM ,R_HDR.IMPT_CNTNR_NUM ,PO_HDR.VND_CD ,NVL(WRK.INVTY_STK_STS_CD , R_DTL.INVTY_STK_STS_CD) AS INVTY_STK_STS_CD ,WRK.RWS_STK_QTY ,WRK.WRK_TRX_ID ,WRK.SQ_ID ,ILV.INVTY_LOC_NM AS LOC_NM FROM RWS_HDR R_HDR ,RWS_DTL R_DTL ,PO PO_HDR ,RWS_PUT_AWAY_WRK WRK ,DS_INVTY_LOC_V ILV WHERE R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND R_HDR.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND R_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.RWS_NUM = R_DTL.RWS_NUM AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND R_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PO_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM = PO_HDR.PO_ORD_NUM AND PO_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DTL.RWS_NUM = WRK.RWS_NUM(+) AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = WRK.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM(+) AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WRK.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND WRK.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ILV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DTL.INVTY_LOC_CD = ILV.INVTY_LOC_CD AND ILV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM

SELECT R_HDR.RWS_NUM ,R_HDR.RWS_REF_NUM ,R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,R_HDR.SYS_SRC_CD ,R_HDR.TRX_ORD_NUM ,R_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM ,S_DTL.SO_NUM ,S_DTL.SO_SLP_NUM ,S_DTL.MDSE_CD AS SHIP_MDSE_CD ,S_DTL.TRX_HDR_NUM AS INVTY_ORD_NUM ,S_DTL.TRX_LINE_NUM AS INVTY_ORD_LINE_NUM ,S_DTL.FROM_STK_STS_CD ,R_DTL.RWS_PUT_AWAY_QTY ,R_DTL.IMPT_INV_PK ,S_DTL.TO_INVTY_LOC_CD ,PR_DTL.PO_ORD_NUM ,PR_DTL.PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM ,PO_HDR.VND_CD FROM RWS_HDR R_HDR ,RWS_DTL R_DTL ,PRCH_REQ_DTL PR_DTL ,SHPG_ORD_DTL S_DTL ,PO PO_HDR WHERE R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND R_HDR.RWS_NUM = #rwsNum# AND R_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = R_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.RWS_NUM = R_DTL.RWS_NUM AND R_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PR_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_HDR.PO_RCV_TRX_HDR_NUM = PR_DTL.PO_ORD_NUM AND R_DTL.PO_RCV_TRX_LINE_NUM = PR_DTL.PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM AND R_DTL.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = #rwsDtlLineNum# AND PR_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PR_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = S_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PR_DTL.PRCH_REQ_NUM = S_DTL.PRCH_REQ_NUM AND PR_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM = S_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_NUM AND PR_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM = S_DTL.PRCH_REQ_LINE_SUB_NUM AND S_DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PR_DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PO_HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PR_DTL.PO_ORD_NUM = PO_HDR.PO_ORD_NUM AND PO_HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY S_DTL.SO_NUM ,S_DTL.SO_SLP_NUM

SELECT LW.RTL_SWH_CD FROM CPO_DTL CD ,RTL_SWH LW WHERE CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CD.CPO_ORD_NUM = #cpoOrdNum# AND CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = #cpoDtlLineNum# AND CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = #cpoDtlLineSubNum# AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LW.RTL_WH_CD = #invtyLocCd# AND LW.RTL_SWH_CD = CD.RTL_SWH_CD AND LW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RSW.GLBL_CMPY_CD , RSW.RTL_WH_CD , RSW.RTL_SWH_CD , RSW.RTL_SWH_NM , RSW.RTL_SWH_DESC_TXT , RSW.RTL_WH_CATG_CD , RSW.INVTY_LOC_CD , RSW.PRTY_LOC_FLG , RSW.RTL_SWH_DSBL_FLG , RSW.EFF_FROM_DT , RSW.EFF_THRU_DT , RSW.MRP_ENBL_FLG FROM RTL_SWH RSW WHERE RSW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RSW.INVTY_LOC_CD = #invtyLocCd# AND RSW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY RSW.RTL_WH_CD , RSW.RTL_SWH_CD

SELECT DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_03 AS INBD_OTBD_CD ,DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_04 AS SWH_CD FROM DS_COND_CONST DCC WHERE DCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_GRP_ID = #condConstGrpId# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01 = #trxCd# AND DCC.DS_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_02 = #trxRsnCd# AND DCC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
